title: Pet Friendly, Renovated Interiors, 9-Foot Ceilings
posting_body: Addison on Fourth is a low-income apartment community located in the heart of downtown Seattle between 4th Ave S. and Jackson street.
Addison is located close to the Seattle stadiums, major transit, restaurants, shopping and much more.
The International District and Pioneer Square are just blocks away.
You'll enjoy on-site amenities such as the resident lounge, fitness facility, and on-site management means convenience for you.
Call or visit us online to schedule your tour of Addison and learn about our low-income community.
With a location close to several art galleries, restaurants, cafes, and landmarks, you'll love calling Addison on Fourth your new home!

All occupants cannot be a full-time student or have been in a full-time student for more than 5 months out of the last calendar year.
